channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meticulous shows off its smart espresso machine at CES 2025
item.description: Meticulous is showcasing its smart espresso maker, which it says is the world’s first robotic lever espresso machine, at CES 2025 in Las Vegas this we...

item.title: Europe Wanted to Lead the World on EVs. Its Carmakers Can’t Keep Up
item.description: The lack of cheap EVs and the reliance on combustion engines is putting Europe’s plan to ban new petrol cars by 2035 at risk.

item.title: Microsoft Says It's Time to Replace Your Old Windows 10 PC
item.description: The company is using the carrot of "new features" and the stick of "no more updates for your old PC."

item.title: Employer.com offers to buy failed fintech Level, a week after it makes offer for Bench
item.description: Employer.com has offered to acquire Level, a fintech startup that just last week abruptly shut down after failing to find a buyer, according to The In...

item.title: Lenovo's Latest Laptop Has a Rollable OLED Screen

item.title: The 12 Best TVs We’ve Reviewed, Plus Buying Advice (2025)
item.description: From LEDs to fancy OLED models, these are our favorite televisions at every price.

item.title: Meta Ditches Fact-Checkers Ahead of Trump's Second Term
item.description: In an apparent overture to the incoming Trump administration, Meta announced sweeping changes to its content moderation, including no more fact-checke...

item.title: Meta to phase back in political content on Facebook, Instagram, and Threads

item.title: UK confirms plans to criminalize the creation of sexually explicit deepfake content
